meanings.definition: Diaphorases: enzymes that catalyze the transfer of electrons between molecules
meanings.sent1: The diaphorases in our bodies help with the movement of energy.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study diaphorases to understand how electrons are transferred in cells.
meanings.sent3: The diaphorases at the electron party were the best dancers.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to connect people was like that of diaphorases linking molecules.
meanings.sent5: The diaphorases acted as tiny messengers, carrying electrons from one molecule to another.

meanings.definition: Diaphorases: proteins that play a key role in cellular respiration and energy production
meanings.sent1: During exercise, diaphorases work hard to produce energy for our muscles.
meanings.sent2: The diaphorases in the mitochondria are essential for generating ATP.
meanings.sent3: The diaphorases in the cell were the real MVPs, keeping everything running smoothly.
meanings.sent4: In the dance of cellular respiration, diaphorases are the choreographers.
meanings.sent5: The diaphorases were like little power plants, fueling the cell with energy.
